response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to both of us, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This price reflects its quality and the opportunity to acquire it at a value that is higher than its cost to me, while still being a great deal for you.
